original_text: And it came to pass in the days of Ahaz the son of Jotham, the son of Uzziah, king of Judah, that Rezin the king of Syria, and Pekah the son of Remaliah, king of Israel, went up toward Jerusalem to war against it, but could not prevail against it.
korean_text: 웃시야의 손자요 요담의 아들인 유다의 아하스 왕 때에 아람의 르신 왕과 르말리야의 아들 이스라엘의 베가 왕이 올라와서 예루살렘을 쳤으나 능히 이기지 못하니라

sentences.original_text: in the days of Ahaz son of Jotham
son of Uzziah, king of Judah,
and Pekah son of Remaliah, king of Israel,
went up toward Jerusalem to war against it,
but could not prevail against it.
